SIMRES.SCRIPT:
# SIMRES input script # Setting of reference operation modes # Gererated by beer.simres # Version: 1.6 # Template: BEER_modes.inp # Date: July 10, 2020, 20:35:18 #---------------------------------------------------------
# Set source tables #---------------------------------------------------------------------- set SOURCE FLUXTAB ESS2016_W2_thermal_5ms.tab:ESS2016_W2_cold_5ms.tab set SOURCE OVERLAP 0 set SOURCE DELAY 0.9 XML SOURCE
# Set wavelength range, 0.2 .. 10.2 #---------------------------------------------------------------------- set INST LAMBDA 5.2 set SOURCE LAMW 1.92308 XML UPDATE
#----------------- # OPTIONS #-----------------
# Set misalignment 0.02 mm #---------------------------------------------------------------------- SET NBOA MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET BBG MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GSW MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCA1 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCA2 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCA3 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCA4 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCB MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCC MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCE MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCF MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GCG MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GE1 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GN1 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GN2 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GSH2 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GE2AS MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GE2A MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GE2B MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GT1 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GT2 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GF1 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GF2 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GMINI MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GEX1 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02 SET GEX2 MISALIGN 0.02 0.02
# Set waviness 0.2 mrad #---------------------------------------------------------------------- SET NBOA WAV 0.2 SET BBG WAV 0.2 SET GSW WAV 0.2 SET GCA1 WAV 0.2 SET GCA2 WAV 0.2 SET GCA3 WAV 0.2 SET GCA4 WAV 0.2 SET GCB WAV 0.2 SET GCC WAV 0.2 SET GCE WAV 0.2 SET GCF WAV 0.2 SET GCG WAV 0.2 SET GE1 WAV 0.2 SET GN1 WAV 0.2 SET GN2 WAV 0.2 SET GSH2 WAV 0.2 SET GE2AS WAV 0.2 SET GE2A WAV 0.2 SET GE2B WAV 0.2 SET GT1 WAV 0.2 SET GT2 WAV 0.2 SET GF1 WAV 0.2 SET GF2 WAV 0.2 SET GMINI WAV 0.2 SET GEX1 WAV 0.2 SET GEX2 WAV 0.2
# Set chopper overlapping off #---------------------------------------------------------------------- # To ignore frame overlaps and speed up simulation, set choppers like this: SET PSC1 OVERLAP 0 SET PSC2 OVERLAP 0 SET PSC3 OVERLAP 0 SET FC1A OVERLAP 0 SET FC1B OVERLAP 0 SET MCA OVERLAP 0 SET MCB OVERLAP 0 SET MCC OVERLAP 0 SET FC2A OVERLAP 0 SET FC2B OVERLAP 0
#---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- # REFERENCE OPERATION MODES # Start always with fully open beam, F0, then use the setting below #---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Stop resolution choppers
# PSC1 off set PSC1 FRQ 0 set PSC1 TIMING 0:1 set PSC1 T0 0 set PSC1 LOCKT0 0 set PSC1 ADJ 1 XML PSC1
# PSC2 off set PSC2 FRQ 0 set PSC2 TIMING 0:1 set PSC2 T0 0 set PSC2 LOCKT0 0 set PSC2 ADJ 1 XML PSC2
# PSC3 off set PSC3 FRQ 0 set PSC3 TIMING 0:1 set PSC3 T0 0 set PSC3 LOCKT0 0 set PSC3 ADJ 1 XML PSC3
# MCA off set MCA FRQ 0 set MCA TIMING 0:1:0.125:1:0.25:1:0.375:1:0.5:1:0.625:1:0.75:1:0.875:1 set MCA T0 0 set MCA LOCKT0 0 set MCA ADJ 1 XML MCA
# MCB off set MCB FRQ 0 set MCB TIMING 0:1:0.0625:1:0.125:1:0.1875:1:0.25:1:0.3125:1:0.375:1:0.4375:1:0.5:1:0.5625:1:0.625:1:0.6875:1:0.75:1:0.8125:1:0.875:1:0.9375:1 set MCB T0 0 set MCB LOCKT0 0 set MCB ADJ 1 XML MCB
# MCC off set MCC FRQ 0 set MCC TIMING 0:45:0.3125:1:0.375:1:0.4375:1:0.5:1:0.5625:1:0.625:1:0.6875:1 set MCC T0 0 set MCC LOCKT0 0 set MCC ADJ 1 XML MCC
# Stop wavelength selection choppers
# FC1A off set FC1A FRQ 0 set FC1A TIMING 0:1 set FC1A T0 0 set FC1A LOCKT0 0 set FC1A ADJ 1 XML FC1A
# FC1B off set FC1B FRQ 0 set FC1B TIMING 0:1 set FC1B T0 0 set FC1B LOCKT0 0 set FC1B ADJ 1 XML FC1B
# FC2A off set FC2A FRQ 0 set FC2A TIMING 0:1 set FC2A T0 0 set FC2A LOCKT0 0 set FC2A ADJ 1 XML FC2A
# FC2B off set FC2B FRQ 0 set FC2B TIMING 0:1 set FC2B T0 0 set FC2B LOCKT0 0 set FC2B ADJ 1 XML FC2B
# Setting slits for mode=0 set SL1 SIZE(1) 100 set SL1 SIZE(2) 100 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 100 set SL2 SIZE(2) 100 XML SL2 set SL3 SIZE(1) 100 set SL3 SIZE(2) 100 XML SL3 set GEX1 ACTIVE 1 1 1 1 XML GEX1
#---------------------------------------------------------------------- # 0, F0, Maximum white beam, full pulse, full beam #----------------------------------------------------------------------
# Stop resolution choppers
# PSC1 off set PSC1 FRQ 0 set PSC1 TIMING 0:1 set PSC1 T0 0 set PSC1 LOCKT0 0 set PSC1 ADJ 1 XML PSC1
# PSC2 off set PSC2 FRQ 0 set PSC2 TIMING 0:1 set PSC2 T0 0 set PSC2 LOCKT0 0 set PSC2 ADJ 1 XML PSC2
# PSC3 off set PSC3 FRQ 0 set PSC3 TIMING 0:1 set PSC3 T0 0 set PSC3 LOCKT0 0 set PSC3 ADJ 1 XML PSC3
# MCA off set MCA FRQ 0 set MCA TIMING 0:1:0.125:1:0.25:1:0.375:1:0.5:1:0.625:1:0.75:1:0.875:1 set MCA T0 0 set MCA LOCKT0 0 set MCA ADJ 1 XML MCA
# MCB off set MCB FRQ 0 set MCB TIMING 0:1:0.0625:1:0.125:1:0.1875:1:0.25:1:0.3125:1:0.375:1:0.4375:1:0.5:1:0.5625:1:0.625:1:0.6875:1:0.75:1:0.8125:1:0.875:1:0.9375:1 set MCB T0 0 set MCB LOCKT0 0 set MCB ADJ 1 XML MCB
# MCC off set MCC FRQ 0 set MCC TIMING 0:45:0.3125:1:0.375:1:0.4375:1:0.5:1:0.5625:1:0.625:1:0.6875:1 set MCC T0 0 set MCC LOCKT0 0 set MCC ADJ 1 XML MCC
# Stop wavelength selection choppers
# FC1A off set FC1A FRQ 0 set FC1A TIMING 0:1 set FC1A T0 0 set FC1A LOCKT0 0 set FC1A ADJ 1 XML FC1A
# FC1B off set FC1B FRQ 0 set FC1B TIMING 0:1 set FC1B T0 0 set FC1B LOCKT0 0 set FC1B ADJ 1 XML FC1B
# FC2A off set FC2A FRQ 0 set FC2A TIMING 0:1 set FC2A T0 0 set FC2A LOCKT0 0 set FC2A ADJ 1 XML FC2A
# FC2B off set FC2B FRQ 0 set FC2B TIMING 0:1 set FC2B T0 0 set FC2B LOCKT0 0 set FC2B ADJ 1 XML FC2B
# Setting slits for mode=0 set SL1 SIZE(1) 100 set SL1 SIZE(2) 100 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 100 set SL2 SIZE(2) 100 XML SL2 set SL3 SIZE(1) 100 set SL3 SIZE(2) 100 XML SL3 set GEX1 ACTIVE 1 1 1 1 XML GEX1
set TR DIR 0
set TR CNT 200000
DO MC
cmd BEAM1D X 0 cmd BEAM1D XAUTO 1 cmd BEAM1D NP 100 cmd BEAM1D COM mode F0 do BEAM1D cmd GRSAVE FILE F0_x.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
cmd BEAM1D X 1 cmd BEAM1D XAUTO 1 cmd BEAM1D NP 100 cmd BEAM1D COM mode F0 do BEAM1D cmd GRSAVE FILE F0_y.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
cmd BEAM1D X 3 cmd BEAM1D XAUTO 1 cmd BEAM1D NP 100 cmd BEAM1D COM mode F0 do BEAM1D cmd GRSAVE FILE F0_kx.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
cmd BEAM1D X 4 cmd BEAM1D XAUTO 1 cmd BEAM1D NP 100 cmd BEAM1D COM mode F0 do BEAM1D cmd GRSAVE FILE F0_ky.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
cmd BEAM1D X 8 cmd BEAM1D X0 5.2 cmd BEAM1D DX 10 cmd BEAM1D XAUTO 0 cmd BEAM1D NP 100 cmd BEAM1D COM mode F0 do BEAM1D cmd GRSAVE FILE F0_lam.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
cmd BEAM1D X 6 cmd BEAM1D XAUTO 1 cmd BEAM1D NP 100 cmd BEAM1D COM mode F0 do BEAM1D cmd GRSAVE FILE F0_t.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
